definition.name: Repo Visualizer
definition.description: A GitHub Action that creates an SVG diagram of your repo
definition.author: GitHub OCTO

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: A path (relative to the root of your repo) to where you would like the diagram to live. For example: images/diagram.svg. Default: diagram.svg

inputs.name: excluded_paths
inputs.description: A list of paths to exclude from the diagram, separated by commas. For example: dist,node_modules

evidence.reasoning: The action generates a visual representation of the repository, which aids in documentation and understanding of the code structure, thus falling under both Documentation and Code quality.
